name: Pixel Painter (omoide)
description:
Use WASD or arrow keys to move directions.
Miles will paint the space he lands on.
But watch out! For every 2 spaces Miles moves, Eraserhead will move 1 space and erase the space they land on.
You don't want to be next to Eraserhead at the end of your turn or else he will attack you and the game will be over.
When a certain amount of spaces are filled, Miles' favorite food, a matcha donut will appear on the board.
The matcha donut will allow Miles to push the Eraserhead out of the board by walking in their direction.
When Miles is powered up, Eraserhead won't be able to attack him!
Fill up all the empty spaces to win!

Created for Mini Jam 98: with the theme "Empty" with the limitation of "Roguelike"
